# Manuscript of Jack Were-Son (Level 10 Universalist)
## Overview
*Blood, dirt, wine, and more stain this white leather book. The owner’s name, Jack Were-son, is stamped into the cover in peeling gold, yet no more information about the author is immediately evident. Several of the pages contain careful diagrams and illustrations done by a competent but uninspiring artist.*

**Protection** Average lock with *[[Arcane Lock (Spell)|arcane lock]]* (DC 35) and *[[Explosive Runes (Spell)|explosive runes]]* (Reflex DC 16)

**Value** 2,820 gp

**Spells**

5th—*[[Break Enchantment (Spell)|break enchantment]]*, *[[Mage's Private Sanctum (Spell)|mage’s private sanctum]]*, *[[Polymorph (Spell)|polymorph]]*, *[[Treasure Stitching (Spell)|treasure stitching]]*

4th—*[[Charm Monster (Spell)|charm monster]]*, *[[Dimension Door (Spell)|dimension door]]*, *[[Invisibility, Greater (Spell)|greater invisibility]]*, *[[Moonstruck (Spell)|moonstruck]]*, *[[True Form (Spell)|true form]]*

3rd—*[[Cloak of Winds (Spell)|cloak of winds]]*, *[[Explosive Runes (Spell)|explosive runes]]*, *[[Haste (Spell)|haste]]*, *[[Lightning Bolt (Spell)|lightning bolt]]*, *[[Nondetection (Spell)|nondetection]]*, *[[Twilight Knife (Spell)|twilight knife]]*

2nd—*[[Acid Arrow (Spell)|acid arrow]]*, *[[Burning Gaze (Spell)|burning gaze]]*, *[[Dust of Twilight (Spell)|dust of twilight]]*, *[[Fog Cloud (Spell)|fog cloud]]*, *metabolize*, *[[Protection from Arrows (Spell)|protection from arrows]]*, *[[Spider Climb (Spell)|spider climb]]*

1st—*[[Alter Winds (Spell)|alter winds]]*, *[[Ant Haul (Spell)|ant haul]]*, *[[Burning Hands (Spell)|burning hands]]*, *[[Cause Fear (Spell)|cause fear]]*, *[[Hold Portal (Spell)|hold portal]]*, *[[Identify (Spell)|identify]]*, *[[Magic Missile (Spell)|magic missile]]*, *[[Sleep (Spell)|sleep]]*, *[[Stone Fist (Spell)|stone fist]]*, *[[Vanish (Spell)|vanish]]*

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 123
